ModMetaData.name: Gear Up And Go (fork)
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description:
The original author Uuugggg has sadly passed away. I'll maintain this (or other mods) to keep his mods alive. Uuugggg already did most of the work for 1.6.
## Original Description
A button to GEAR UP AND GO. Draft, get gear for the current ouffit, and go to a targeted location.
Will set a policy for the mod Better Pawn Control when the button is clicked. Set the policy name in the Settings.
Check Steam page for any updated info.
